title: Apocalypse Z
description: Paperback edition.A deadly virus is ravaging the world. Zombies roam the streets and mankind is nearing extinction. In an attempt to escape the virus and zombie's grasp, the Jacobs family and a group of young adults must travel 1,300 miles up the West Coast to a cabin located high in the mountains of Washington. Things donâ€™t go as planned and their trip quickly turns into a life or death struggle. Along the way they fight zombies, psychos, freaks, and sometimes amongst themselves.This book contains graphic violence, sex, and strong language.This is the first book in the Apocalypse Z series.Apocalypse Z (A Zombie Novel)Apocalypse Z: Uncommon Ground (Zombie Novel #2)
author: G.E. Swanson
